name: Major Tom To
description:
🔸Have you ever wondered what it would feel like to peacefully float through the ground only for every molecule of your being to be rejected by overlapping mass and be violently thrust from floor into the air?

    🔸That's a reality check coming straight at you from ground control. It's time for your response.

    🔸In this game press and hold the spacebar to melt through the floor and release to watch yourself rebound into the air! The longer space is held the higher you'll fly. Making it to the end in one piece is going to be hard than you think!

.
.
.

  • WASD  to  move
  • Spacebar  to  Sink/Launch
  • Left Shift to Sprint
  • Mouse to look around

.
.
.

Some information:
💡 This game Made for "GMTK Jam 2020" in two days
💡 The theme was «out of control»
💡 Five-member team

Team members:
   ◻️  Programming: Orion Mendes and Trevor Libby
  ◻️ Music and SFX: Abraham Abushmais
  ◻️ Artist: ak-疼痛
  ◻️ Level designer: Amin Montazeri .
.
.
